Sentencas: Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 (SDC) powders have been synthesized by a combustion method with polyvinyl alcohol (PVA) as the fuel and nitrate as oxidizer.
Titulo: Polyvinyl alcohol-induced low temperature synthesis of CeO2-based powders

Sentencas: A calcination temperature of 350 degrees C was found to be sufficient for the formation of pure SDC powders.
Titulo: Polyvinyl alcohol-induced low temperature synthesis of CeO2-based powders

Sentencas: The cell parameters were calculated using the peak positions determined from the XRD patterns, and it was found that stoichiometric SDC powder could be obtained only when stoichiometric PVA fuel contents were used.
Titulo: Polyvinyl alcohol-induced low temperature synthesis of CeO2-based powders

Sentencas: The as-prepared SDC pellets exhibited 98% of the theoretical density sintered at 1300 degrees C.
Titulo: Polyvinyl alcohol-induced low temperature synthesis of CeO2-based powders

Sentencas: This shows that the SDC powders obtained by this combustion method have excellent sintering properties, which can densified at a relatively low sintering temperature.
Titulo: Polyvinyl alcohol-induced low temperature synthesis of CeO2-based powders

Sentencas: The powders made by this method, due to its high conductivity of 0.033 S cm(-1) at 700 degrees C, are suitable for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Polyvinyl alcohol-induced low temperature synthesis of CeO2-based powders
